This game is great for anyone who likes survival horror games that are online. You can play with friends or with randoms, and the balance of Hunters vs Survivors is really great. All hunters are significantly different, and mastering one hunter doesn't mean you can be a pro at them all. Survivors can also bring items into the game, like flashlights, maps, and medkits. All and all I think there are a few balance issues that could be resolved but don't necessarily need to be solved. 10/10

TL;DR they need to fix their customer service.

Can't return their PAYING customers back their lost auric cells they develop and code???? wow, just wow.... not to mistaken world of warcraft wow, but the wow as "expressing astonishment or admiration," definitely not of the latter.

A response from their support team:

"Hello,

Thanks for your message. Again, I am so sorry but here at support, our hands are tied with certain things. We hope that you have a great day regardless and that you stay safe this holiday season.

Please feel free to contact us again if you have any other questions or issues."

Positive reviewers, just wait until you get crapped on...

EDIT: After damn near 4 months of complaining, I finally get my auric cells, but split between my linked BHVR accounts. Still better than nothing, but I hope they get their customer service skills up. 

I still enjoy playing the game with friends/family, but I am very hesitant to pay any money their way after this experience.

600 horas ¿qué decir?

[b] En pocas palabras[/b]: siempre me encantaron los Survival horror, pero para poder jugarlos y disfrutarlos es necesario tener varias horas disponibles. Con Dead By Daylight, se tiene la adrenalina de los Survival horror pero en formato multiplayer, con partidas breves que permiten jugarlo en intervalos cortos de tiempo.

Y...sí, [i]super buggeado[/i], pero...

awesome game fun with friends
I just recently got a new PC and this game runs perfect! Its also a great game to get used to keyboard and mouse. Its also a fun and great game. I would 100% percent recommond this game.

Have over 1000 hours and counting, sure the game has some annoyances but for me personally I really enjoy the game. Playing with friends is a blast and the amount of content being released keeps my interest in the game.

Enjoyable with friends and in random matches, not had any issues with lag or noticed any bugs so far so definitely recommended! Nice selection of killers and survivors and can play without buying any extras.

Bu oyunu oynarken nedense donuyorum abi mevsim falan fark etmiyor donuyorum nedenini çözemedim neyse güzel oyun toxic oyuncuları camperları dışında
Gioco diversamente bello, è una tortura e per trovare una partita devi spendere 15 anni.
Kozak za cenę na promocji. Nic dodać, nic ująć.

Il gioco in se per se è meraviglioso, lo stesso concept del gioco è originale, è dotato di una lore gigantesca, si può migliorare molto rapidamente qualsiasi personaggio e sopratutto, non è necessario shoppare per ottenere i personaggi del DLC.

Il gioco ha anche il cross play che mi ha praticamente risolto la metà dei miei problemi nel giocare con i miei amici (che giocano da PS), ha forse un po' di lag dovuto a i server del crossplay, am a quanto sembra succede solo con le connessioni instabili come le mie...

L'unica cosa che potrebbe non piacervi (specialmente se giocate principalmente killer) è la parte tossica della community che solitamente vi insulterà in malo modo appena ne avrà l'occasione dopo avervi fatto 1 trick buono su 10 falliti, non perdeteci tempo e riportateli, e sopratutto non abbandonate la speranza poiché esistono anche dei Survivors/Killer gentiluomini che sanno giocare e compiono atti di bontà gratuiti seguendo quella che sarebbe "l'etichetta del pro della lobby".

Detto questo il gioco va provato per comprendere effettivamente quanto è bello, e sopratutto va giocato con gli amici. Detto questo, spero vi divertiate e che facciate amicizia con la parte buona della community

Interesting gameplay mechanics but completely broken by: the fact the game doesn't take into account the fact most player talk and coordinate on a voice chat making it extremely hard for killers,  a shitty unbalanced matchmaking which also forces you to play with console who have an large unfair advantage, way too many toxic players who troll the killer (and shame you for using perks that give you an advantage), many bugs (weapons not touching, perks not working, lags,...)

Unless you have experience with the mechanics of this game, DO NOT BUY IT.  It is incredibly unbalanced. Take one look at the subreddit and you'll see that the devs only play with each other and do not balance this game for the competitive scene. I'm a red-rank killer and a purple-rank survivor, and every game is a toss-up. If you're looking for a game to get sweaty on, this is not that game.  If you must play, play for fun.

its good, laggy at times, unfair, stupid, and many other things. The game aims for everything to be fair and at times it is but people say other wise. The game has very very cool concepts in the killer genre, perks, and storylines. i like the details they put into each killers, perks, and survivors. Although people may face camp and be toxic, its a very fun game to play with friends and enjoy/ goof off.

I used to play DBD on PS4, but my account got perm suspended. I was really upset because I had bought all survivors and most killers. I decided to try PC and personally it's much better than PS4. Although my PS4 is smoother than my PC, I still highly recommend it.
Also it was annoying trying to play with friends who were on PC while I played on PS4, but switching over has helped a lot.

Buenas tardes a todos, El juego esta bastante bien para jugar con amigos y jugar solo pero claro lo mas divertido obviamente es jugar con amigos. Teniendo un modo de jugar de matar a tus amigos hace que te lo pases bien, los DLC dependiendo de algunos son muy guapos pero para mi punto de vista meter tanta cosa con un periodo de tres meses o menos  me parece a mi que es muy excesivo ya que para mi que juego mucho a diario no puedo meter todas las habilidades en un killer/survivour por que en el momento que hago que todos sean level 40 sacan uno nuevo (aunque eso es tener mala suerte) pero para mi el juego esta bastante bien solo me quejo de eso pero a la vez me gusta que actualicen el juego y que metan cosas nuevas por que así meten  mas variedad en killers y survivours por si encuentras alguno que te guste mas que otros por su poder o por su aspecto o skins .
